experiences.description: Designed and implemented data pipelines for a variety of clients in the financial and telecommunications sectors. Developed ETL processes using Python, Spark, and SQL. Collaborated with data scientists to build machine learning models.
Led a team of data engineers in the development of a new data warehouse on AWS. Implemented best practices for data security and governance. Mentored junior engineers and provided technical guidance.

Responsible for the overall architecture and strategy for data management. Worked with stakeholders across the organization to define data requirements. Evaluated new technologies and made recommendations for improvements to the data infrastructure. Improved query performance by 40% through query optimization and indexing strategies.

education.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on data structures, algorithms, and software design. Participated in a research project on distributed systems.

Specialized in machine learning and big data analytics. Completed a thesis on the application of deep learning to natural language processing. Coursework included statistical inference, data mining, and cloud computing.
